example.eg: The government set up a fund for orphans.
example.egtrans: 政府为孤儿群体设立了一项基金。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 资金, 基金, 专款

example.eg: Eric spread his money across several investment funds.
example.egtrans: 艾瑞克将自己的钱分散到几种不同的投资上。

example.eg: This biologist has a fund of knowledge on insect anatomy.
example.egtrans: 该生物学家在昆虫解剖学方面有丰富的知识储备。

example.eg: I'd like to learn French, but I don't have the funds to pay for evening classes.
example.egtrans: 我很想学法语，不过我没有足够支付夜校的资金。

example.eg: The special interest group funded the politician's campaign.
example.egtrans: 那个特殊利益集团资助了这位政治家的竞选活动。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 竞选基金, 竞选经费
交易型开放式指数基金, 交易所交易基金
交易型开放式指数基金, 交易所交易基金

example.eg: She works as a fundraiser for a major nonprofit.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 慈善筹款者, 资金募集者

example.eg: We went to a fundraiser last night for cancer research.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 慈善筹款活动, 资金募集活动

example.eg: We rely on fundraising to keep our services going.  Our fundraising has earned us $1000 for our charity.
We are going to a fundraising dinner tonight.
example.egtrans: 今晚，我们将要组织一场筹款晚宴。

dsense.name: fundraising dinner, also UK: fund-raising dinner

example.eg: I need to sell as many tickets as possible for the charity's fundraising dinner.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 慈善宴会, 筹款宴会
对冲基金, 共同基金会, 互惠基金会, 联合基金会
养老金，养老基金，退休基金

example.eg: I live off a trust fund that was set up by my uncle.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 信托基金, 信贷基金
